癕字的基本解释

癕
yōng
古同“痈”：“以天下攻齐，如以千钧之弩决溃癕也。”

癕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yōng］
［《廣韻》於容切，平鍾，影。］
亦作“癕1”。“痈1”的繁体字。
(1)肿疡。一种皮肤和皮下组织化脓性的炎症，多发于颈、背，常伴有寒热等全身症状，严重者可并发败血症。
(2)鼻疾，不知香臭。
(3)喻祸患。
(4)用同“雍”。

癕字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癕； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页781第20
【五音集韻】於容切，音邕。同癰。【史記·穰侯傳】如以千鈞之弩決潰癕也。

癕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
癕字的起名意思

暂无。

癕
Basic explanation of words
癕
yōng
Gu Tong's "carbuncle": "To attack the whole world, like a crossbow of a thousand junks to defeat the carbuncle."
癕
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yōng］
["Guangyun" Yu Rongqie, Pingzhong, Ying. ]
Also known as "癕1". Traditional characters for "痈1".
(1) Tumors. A purulent inflammation of the skin and subcutaneous tissues, mostly in the neck and back, often accompanied by systemic symptoms such as cold and heat. In severe cases, it can be complicated by sepsis.
(2) Nasal disease, I don't know the smell or smell.
(3) Yu misfortune.
(4) Use the same as "Yong".
癕
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　癕; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 781 20
[Pentagram Rhyme] Yu Rongqie, Yin Yong. Same as carbuncle. 【Historical Records·Rang Hou Biography】It is as if it was defeated by the crossbow of a thousand junks.
